details.description: Book your practical driving test from £62 using the only official driving test booking service - book online or by phone or post
details.alternative_title: Book your official Driving Standards Agency (DSA) practical driving test
details.more_information:
You’ll need your:

- Great Britain or Northern Ireland driving licence number
- theory test pass certificate number and date you passed (if needed)
- credit or debit card - find out [how much it costs](/driving-theory-practical-test-fees "driving test fees")

You can [find your theory test pass certificate number](/find-lost-theory-test-pass-certificate-number "Find your lost theory test pass certificate number") online if you've lost your original letter.

If you're taking a car test and have your driving instructor's personal reference number you can use this to check they're available, but can book your test without doing this.

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA)](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for DSA") before you start.
details.introduction: Book your official practical driving test - you'll need to have passed your theory test. You can book online between 6am and 11:40pm.
details.alternate_methods:
##Book by phone

You can book your practical driving test by phone by calling DSA.

$C

**DSA practical test bookings**

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122  
**Welsh language:** 0300 200 1133  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1144  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

$C

##Book by post

To book your practical test by post, download the application form and send with the correct fee to DSA.

You can pay by cheque or postal order - make your cheque or postal order payable to the ‘Driving Standards Agency’. You can’t pay by cash.

$D [Download ‘Postal application for a practical driving test appointment’ (PDF, 336KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_202263.pdf "Download ‘Postal application for a practical driving test appointment’ form (PDF, 336KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

$A

DSA
PO Box 280
Newcastle-upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP 

$A

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
*[LGV]: Large goods vehicle
*[PCV]: Passenger carrying vehicle

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
Cancel your practical driving test if you no longer need your appointment - give 3 working days' notice to get a refund
